headline: VULCAN MATERIALS COMPANY ANNOUNCES CEO SUCCESSION PLAN
summary: Vulcan Materials Company (NYSE:VMC), the nation's largest producer of construction aggregates, announced that its Board of Directors has named Ronnie Pruitt Chief Executive Officer, effective January 1, 2026.

raw.headline: VULCAN MATERIALS COMPANY ANNOUNCES CEO SUCCESSION PLAN
